metadata.name: Manage Competencies
metadata.shortDescription: Complete competency lifecycle management - create, edit, delete, and validate OLAF competencies
metadata.description: Comprehensive competency management skill that handles the full lifecycle of OLAF competencies including creation of new competencies from scratch or existing files, editing existing competencies (structure, files, manifest), safe deletion with dependency checking, and validation of competency structure and integrity.
objectives: Create new competencies with proper structure, manifest, and documentation
Edit existing competencies safely (files, structure, dependencies, manifest)
Delete competencies with dependency validation and backup
Validate competency structure, manifest, and file integrity
Manage dependencies and ensure competency follows OLAF standards and best practices
metadata.author: GitHub Copilot
